Hai già completato il quiz: You have already completed the quiz
Puoi accedere al report nell'apposita se:
You can access the report in the appropriate section.
We will send you an email when you can take the questionnaire again so that you can compare the results.
In the meantime, remember to practice your family skills!
And if you have any questions or suggestions, please contact our staff!
Il prossimo questionario sarà disponibil: The next quiz will be available on %s
Eccoti alla fine del questionario. Hai r: There you are at the end of the questionnaire. You have answered all the questions.
In any case, you completed it.
Tra qualche mese ti manderemo un'e-mail: In a few months we will send you an e-mail so that you can fill in the questionnaire again and compare the results of your answers.
Ma perché ci sia un cambiamento devi all: But for there to be a change you have to train. For this, we will give you some tips in the report.
Adesso puoi accedere al tuo report nell': You can now access your report in the appropriate section.
Devi indicare una risposta. Pensaci anco: You have to indicate an answer. Think about it some more and then make your choice
Non hai ancora risposto a:: You have not yet replied to:
Ciao %s, benvenuto nella tua area riserv: Hello %s, welcome to your reserved area, from here you can access the portal functions.
Ecco il tuo codice identificativo da inv: Here is your identification code to send to the parents in your group, they will need it to register on the platform and be associated with you.
Accedi alla pagina del tuo profilo perso: Access your profile page to edit your information.
Rispondi alle domande del nostro family: Answer the questions in our family skills self evaluation tool.
Non esistono genitori perfetti e non esi: There are no perfect parents and there is no recipe for perfect parents. Every parent and every child is unique, and unique is their relationship.
Ma ci si può mettere in gioco ed allenar: But we can get involved and train some skills that will be useful in facing the daily challenges that the experience of becoming or being a parent puts before us!
Nessun questionario assegnato alla tua u: No quiz assigned to your account.
Ciao %s, in questa sezione trovi l'elenc: Hi %s, in this section you will find the list of parents associated with your group.
Gestisci i tuoi gruppi. Scrivi direttame: Manage your groups. Type the name of your new group directly into the box and confirm with a comma (key ',')
Inserisci la tua email e la tua password: Enter your email and password to access the reserved area
Oppure compila il modulo di registrazion: Or fill in the registration form
Ciao %s, questa è la sezione dove potrai: Hi %s, this is the section where you can edit your personal data.
Attualmente non hai nessun questionario: You currently have no questionnaire to fill in.
Compila il modulo per registrarti ed acc: Fill in the form to register and access the portal.
Se hai già un account accedi con le tue: If you already have an account, log in with your credentials in the login area.
